summary: Completed comprehensive testing of data context questionnaire feature for lead companies. All backend APIs and frontend functionality working correctly. Cliente cuestionario can fill and submit questionnaire, cliente apta correctly does NOT see questionnaire, and asesor can view submitted data in Diagn칩stico tab.
